problem_text:
(E. Zelmanov). Let F be a field of characteristic p > 0, and let Γ be the principal congruence subgroup of Aut(F[x1, . . . , xn]) consisting of all automorphisms that send each variable xi to xi modulo terms of higher degree. Then Γ is a residually-p group. Does Γ satisfy a pro-p identity?
E. I. Khukhro
